question: 忘れ物
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>忘れる</ja> is "to <kanji>forget</kanji>"? Well, a <kanji>thing</kanji> you've forgotten is a <vocabulary>forgotten item</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You didn't learn this reading with the kanji <ja>忘</ja>, but you did learn it with the vocabulary <ja>忘れる</ja>.  What <reading>was</reading> (<ja>わす</ja>) that reading again? You can't remember! It's become a <vocabulary>forgotten item</vocabulary>!
